meaningMnemonic: 張る is <kanji>to stretch</kanji>. You're <kanji>stubborn</kanji> and want to stretch out what you're doing right now. Although you're stubborn, you keep doing it. You persevere. That's why this word is <vocabulary>to persevere</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to do one's best</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is the reading for 頑 and 張る put together but the 張る part gets rendaku'd so keep that in mind.
